profile.title: Propyil ning Gumagamit
profile.mustLogin: Kailangan mung mag-sign in ba makakita king settings.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Pakitan ing orihinal kapamilatan ning salin
profile.noPrivateKey: Ala yang private key king device a ini para i-export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Magtakda password para i-encrypt ing backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ilagay ing password para king backup a ini:
profile.importSuccess: Me-import ne ing private key king device a ini.
profile.importFailed: Ali me-import ing key (mali password o masira ya ing file).
profile.keysRotated: Me-genenerate ne bayung key pair at me-upload ne ing public key.
profile.keyDisclaimer: E lual king device a ini ing private key mu. Mag-export kang kopyang me-password para ma-restore ya king aliwang device.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Free ka ngeni — gamit mu la ring malalam a Sun/Moon a opsyun king baba. Mag-upgrade para buklat la deng aduang tema.
profile.backupDesc: Gumawa kang password-protected a backups da reng keys mu, at i-restore la king aliwang device para mag-sync.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: I-blur la ing mensahi by default
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: I-blur nung e naka-focus ya ing app
profile.notifyOnCopy: Abiswan naku nung mekopya la deng mensaji ku
profile.followHint: Lumual la reng istorya da king Following feed mu nung mag-post la para kareng Followers (o Public).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Atin e me-yari a bagay king section a ini.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: I-forward deng dumaratang a tawag at text king verified a telepunu mu o email. Atin yang opsyung pakitnang ing Chatforia number mu para kareng outgoing calls/texts.
profile.errE164: Magsulat kang valid a E.164 a telepunu (hal. +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Pumili kang metung man mu (telepunu o email).
profile.errQuietHours: Ing quiet hours dapat atyu king 0 anggang 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Pumili text o chat room para mag-umpisa king pamag-chat

status.captionLabel: Nanu ing atyu king isip mu?

sidebar.loginPrompt: Mag-log in para ayusan deng settings.

premium.heading: Mag-Premium
premium.description: Buksan deng power features at alis deng ads.

auth.headline: Seguru, global a pamag-mensahi a atin instant a salin
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, AI-powered a salin, maglakuang mensahi, at voice/video calling.
auth.desktopTip: King desktop ka? I-scan mu king telepunu mu para kua ing app.
auth.subhead: Pribadu, encrypted, at translated a pamag-mensahi — instant mu.
auth.tip: Malyari me gamit ing Chatforia king nanuman a device — o i-download me ing app para king pekamikananu.
auth.scanHint: I-scan para i-download ing app o buksan king browser.

home.title: Home
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Mag-type ka pa mensahi para ipadala

press.title: Press
press.contact: Para kareng media inquiries, isulat yu kami king press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Para kareng media inquiries, isulat yu kami king press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Ing Chatforia metung yang seguradung messenger a atin instant a salin at E2E encryption, gawa para pamanyulung na ning pribadu at malasakit a usapan king sablang yatu.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, at product imagery (malyari pa).

careers.title: Trabahu
careers.intro: Munti tamung team a mag-obra king metung a pribadu, global a messenger. Nung mikaluguran ka king encryption, accessibility, at malagu a UX, manyabi ka.
careers.openRoles: Open roles: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Pamanyali: I-email yu ing resume/links yu king jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Tungkul king Chatforia
about.description: Ing Chatforia metung yang seguradung, multilingual a messenger a atin end-to-end encryption, instant a salin, at voice/video calling. Misyon mi: pag-ugnayan la reng tawu—seguradu, pribadu, at misasalpan king amanu.

values.control: Kontrol: Optional la deng maglakuang mensahi & read receipts.

about.howDescription: E la lual deng mensahi mu; i-encrypt la king device mu bayu la lumwal. Ing salin, backups, at device sync, me-disenyu para paliitung nanu ing akakit da reng server mi.

advertise.title: Mag-anunsyu king Chatforia
advertise.description: Abutan deng aktibung users king pamag-mensahi kapamilatan da reng malinis, brand-safe a placements. Atin tamung display banners king high-visibility a spots, sponsorships, at house promos. E akit deng ads deng Premium subscribers.

adsense.withPubId: Mipanibatan tamung ads kapamilatan Google AdSense. Nung buri yung i-target kami king Google Ads, gamit yu ing publisher ID {{pubId}} at penibatan yu ing managed placement kareng units keti king baba. Available la reng direct sponsorships—gamitin yu ing form.
adsense.noPubId: Mipanibatan tamung ads kapamilatan Google AdSense. Atin mu namang direct sponsorships—gamitin yu ing form king baba.

advertise.noPlacements: Ala pang configured a placements. I-dagdag la king ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Dakal a balik-balik at matagal a oras king chat UI
why.brandSafe: Brand-safe a formats; marok a frequency capping
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (hal., “Start a Chat” modal) available
why.deals: Direct deals o programmatic kapamilatan AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Dakal a salamat! Mipanayun ya ing inquiry yu. Misan metung mu, manyule latamu.
form.missingRequired: Paki-salese ing lagyu, email, at mensahi.
form.successToast: Dakal a salamat! Manyule kami king sagli.
form.mailtoInfo: Bubuklat ya ing email client yu para i-send ing inquiry…

legal.disclaimerStart: Kapamilatan ning pamag-submit, maka-ayon ka kareng

upgrade.title: Mag-upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Pili ing ustung plan para keka: alis deng ads king Plus, o kuan deng full power features king Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Pamanyulung Umpisa
gettingStarted.subtitle: Bayu ka pa king Chatforia? Ing mabilis a gabay a ini pakitna na reng basics bang magamit me king pira mu pamu minutes.

alert.text: Lumaku ya ing gabay a ini kabang mamagli la reng bayung features. Nung atin kulang, sabian yu kami kapamilatan ning

section1.title: 1) Gawang account mu
section1.loginText: gamit deng atyu mu nang account.

section2.title: 2) Umpisan ing pamag-mensahi
section2.item1: Gawang DM o Group at mag-padalang mumunang mensahi.
section2.item2: Gamit ing instant a salin para maki-usap king 100+ amanu.
section2.item3: Sulayan deng maglakuang mensahi at read receipts king Propyil → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Lumalam
section3.item1Part2: a page (Plus = alis ads, Premium = full features).
section3.item2Part1: I-link deng aliwa pang device at i-setup deng encrypted backups king

account.q: Panu ku gagawan o i-recover ing account ku?
account.a: I-download me ing app o gamit ing web, tap “Create account”, i-verify me ing email/telepunu mu. Para king recover, gamit me ing “Forgot password”.

privacy.a: Opo. Deng mensahi ampong tawag E2E encrypted by default. Ika mu at ing tanggapan mu mu ing makabasa karela.

translate.q: Panu gagana ing instant a salin?
translate.a: I-enable me ing “Auto-translate” king Settings → Appearance & Language. Sisalin tamu king device nung atsu, aliwa secure APIs a atin maragul a limitasyon king metadata.

contact.a: Isulat yu kami king support@chatforia.com. I-lakip yu deng screenshots at version ning app yu.

contact.title: Kontakan mi
contact.successMsg: Dakal a salamat—sagutan da kayu kapamilatan email.
contact.errorSend: Ali me-padala. Paki-email yu ing support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Ing Privacy Policy a ini mamie paliwanag nung pananu mi (“kami”) kulan, gamit, at iye-share deng impu kabang gagamitan yu ing apps at serbisyo mi. Me-disenyu ya ing Chatforia bang paliitang nanu ing akakit mi.

infoWeCollect.title: Impu a kulan mi
infoWeCollect.account: Impu ning account (hal., email/telepunu) para gawang at seguran ing account yu.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted a laman (mensahi/tawag) E2E encrypted; e mi riyan mabasa.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage a kasuyuan a anti mung crash logs, type ning device, o aliwang analytics para pag-ayusan ing performance.

howWeUse.title: Pamag-gamit kareng impu
howWeUse.provide: Ibigay at seguran ing serbisyo (auth, spam/abuse detection).
howWeUse.improve: Pag-ayusan deng features (kalidad ning salin, kasalpantayanan).

sharing.title: Pamag-share
sharing.body: Ali mi bebenta deng personal data. Malyari mi lang i-share deng maragul a pilian a data kareng processors (hal., push notifications, analytics) lalam ning strikto a kontrata.

rights.title: Karuangan yu
rights.body: Agpang king region yu (hal., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), malyari kayung humiling king access, correction, pamag-delete, o opt-out kareng aliwang pamag-proseso. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & seguridad
retention.body: Tagalan mi mu lamu ing makasaup para pakananu ing serbisyo at magmaus a seguridad. E2E a laman e mi mabalik-decrypt.

children.title: Anak-anak
children.body: E mi atin target a lalaki/babai lalam king 13 (o agpang king lokal a ligal) ing Chatforia.

changes.title: Babasan
changes.body: I-post mi reng babasan keti at i-update mi ing “Last updated”.

intro.body: Kapamilatan ning pamag-gamit yu king Chatforia, maka-ayon kayu kareng Terms a ini. Nung e kayu maka-ayon, ali yu ya dapat gamitin ing serbisyo.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Magbigay keng tumpak a impu at seguran deng kredensyales mu.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Aku mu ing mananagut kareng gagawan king account mu.

acceptableUse.title: Katanggap-tanggap a pamag-gamit
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ali kayu milako ligal, abusadu, o mangyupaya a laman; ali kayu mag-spam o automated abuse.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Malyari kang i-suspend/terminate nung atin paglabag.

yourContent.title: Laman yu
yourContent.body: Kekayu pa ren ing karapatan kareng laman yu. Pigbibie yu kami karapatan a kailangan para pakananu ing serbisyo (hal., routing, storage, salin).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Ibiye ya ing serbisyo “as is” alang warranty. King pekamaragul a atian ning ligal, e ya mananagut ing Chatforia kareng indirect o consequential a damyos.

changes.title: Babasan
changes.body: Malyari ming i-update deng terms; ing tuluy mu pang pamag-gamit kayabe ya ing pamananggap.

doNotSell.title: Ali Biyayan o I-Share ing Personal Kung Impu
doNotSell.body: E mibenta ing Chatforia kareng personal a impu. Aliwa man, makasaup la reng residente ning California kapamilatan CPRA king pamag-submit request king baba.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Minimal mu la deng cookies a gamit ning Chatforia (hal., session, seguridad). Ali tamu gamit third-party ads cookies. I-manage yu deng cookies kapamilatan ning settings ning browser yu.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ali me-load ing status ning numero.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ala pang me-italagang numero. Pumili kapamilatan area code para mag-umpisa mag-text.

startChatModal.title: Umpisan ing chat
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Mag-type lagyu, username, telepunu, o email…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Mag-type username o telepunu at i-Press ing Search.
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: Pumili kang metung man a tatanggap.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Ing phone/email entries maging available la kalupa nung i-save yu la bilang contacts.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Me-palpak ing pamag-umpisa chat kareng me-piling tatanggap.

sounds.freeNotice: Free ka ngeni — atyu la reng premium tones pero locked. Mag-upgrade para buksan la ngan.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Ing feature a ini mangailangan yang Premium a plan.

aiSettings.title: AI Settings
aiSettings.controlIntro: Ayusan ing salin, smart replies, at ForiaBot auto-responses.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Automatic a salin kareng dumaratang mensahi
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Ipadala la kareng AI deng bayung na-kamkam a mensahi (sanitized) bang mag-suhestyun king malalam a sagut.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: I-mask ing pagmura king AI a suhesyun
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Nung on, deng suhesyung mibalik king AI atin lang masked a flagged words
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: I-enable ing auto-reply nung busy ku

accessibilitySettings.title: Accessibility & Alerts
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Opsyung pamanyulung king pamag-gamit ning Chatforia nang e asalin king tunug.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Magsulung king normal a sukat. Palakuan nung buri mu dakal a text king accessibility settings.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Visual alerts para kareng mensahi & tawag
Ipakitâ deng banners at mag-blink ing title bang ali mu palyaring milako ing aktibidad.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Mag-vibrate nung atin bayung mensahi (nung supported)
I-trigger ing device vibration kabang atin abisu.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
I-flash ing screen nung atin dumaratang a tawag
Maranun a pumiklat nung mag-ring ing tawag.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Automatic a i-transcribe deng voice notes
I-alakip ing transcript kareng audio messages a kamkam mu.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Visual alerts para kareng mensahi & tawag
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Ipakitâ deng banners at title blink bang e me-milako ing aktibidad.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Mag-vibrate nung atin bayung mensahi (nung supported)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: I-trigger ing vibration kapamilatan ning notifications.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: I-flash ing screen nung dumaratang a tawag
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Maranun a pumiklat nung mag-ring ing tawag.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Ciphertext mu ing i-simpan king server. I-disable na ing AI/Translate at moderation previews.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Linked Devices
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: Ala yang me-akit a linked devices.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Saliksik agpang alias, lagyu, username, o telepunu
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ding pilan a paralan bang mipali.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: I-share ing invite link mu para mag-umpisa kang mipag-chat kapilan man.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Mika-ugnayan ka parati kapamilatan Chatforia para iOS at Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Ing mensahi mu misasabay la king web at mobile.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Mikit kang bayung kakaluguran agad. I-match daka mi at bubuklat tamung metung a temporary a chat room.
randomChat.saveGuard: Human-to-human mu la pu ing malyaring i-save
